description:
The app caused issues when the screen was locked. The Unity bar was kept outside the lock screen, and you can easily see which app was running.
Worse aspect is that you could trigger an app to run in the background of the lock screen and it would show for a split second before surrendering to the lock screen control.
summary: App didn't seem to do anything with the Radeon I had on the laptop

description: I'm guessing some type of malware when there's only 3 results for Radeon and they're all 51.2kb each.
